name: WRAP+ UNLIMITED FOR LIFETIME
description: Python Script to Get WRAP+ VPN unlimited for Lifetime

SEND_LOG.description: Get notification on Telegram regarding total data generated, total attempts & failed attempts. 0 = No & 1 = Yes.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Enter Telegram BOT API Token from @BotFather. Required if SEND_LOG is True.

CHAT_ID.description: Enter CHAT_ID on which you want log message to be sent. It can be Chat ID (mostly for private chats) like -1001877005515 or Chat Username like @mychannel or @mygroup.

HIDE_ID.description: To hide your WARP CLIENT ID from log message sent to your chat. 0 = No & 1 = Yes.
